SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package interfaces

Interface IEnquirySenderService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquirySenderService
public interface IEnquirySenderService
The IEnquirySenderService interface defines methods for managing the creation, editing, and deletion of enquiries by a student, as well as retrieving responded, submitted, and draft enquiries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    createEnquiry(String senderID, String campName, String enquiryMessage, boolean isDraft)
    Creates a new enquiry with the provided details.
    boolean
    deleteDraftEnquiry(int enquiryID, String studentID)
    Deletes the specified draft enquiry created by the student.
    boolean
    editDraftEnquiry(int enquiryID, String studentID, String newMessage, boolean isDraft)
    Edits the specified draft enquiry with new details.
    Map<Integer,Enquiry>
    getRespondedEnquiries(String studentID)
    Retrieves all responded enquiries submitted by the specified student.
    Map<Integer,Enquiry>
    getStudentDraftEnquiries(String studentID)
    Retrieves all draft enquiries created by the specified student.
    Map<Integer,Enquiry>
    getSubmittedEnquiries(String studentID)
    Retrieves all submitted enquiries by the specified student.

  • Method Details

    • getRespondedEnquiries

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> getRespondedEnquiries(String studentID)
      Retrieves all responded enquiries submitted by the specified student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student for whom to retrieve responded enquiries
      Returns:
      a Map of responded enquiries, where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object

    • getSubmittedEnquiries

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> getSubmittedEnquiries(String studentID)
      Retrieves all submitted enquiries by the specified student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student for whom to retrieve submitted enquiries
      Returns:
      a Map of submitted enquiries, where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object

    • getStudentDraftEnquiries

      Map<Integer,Enquiry> getStudentDraftEnquiries(String studentID)
      Retrieves all draft enquiries created by the specified student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student for whom to retrieve draft enquiries
      Returns:
      a Map of draft enquiries, where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object

    • createEnquiry

      int createEnquiry(String senderID, String campName, String enquiryMessage, boolean isDraft)
      Creates a new enquiry with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      senderID - the ID of the student sending the enquiry
      campName - the name of the camp related to the enquiry
      enquiryMessage - the message content of the enquiry
      isDraft - true if the enquiry is a draft, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the ID of the created enquiry

    • editDraftEnquiry

      boolean editDraftEnquiry(int enquiryID, String studentID, String newMessage, boolean isDraft)
      Edits the specified draft enquiry with new details.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - the ID of the draft enquiry to edit
      studentID - the ID of the student editing the draft
      newMessage - the new message content for the draft enquiry
      isDraft - true if the edited enquiry remains a draft, false if it is submitted
      Returns:
      true if the edit is successful, false otherwise

    • deleteDraftEnquiry

      boolean deleteDraftEnquiry(int enquiryID, String studentID)
      Deletes the specified draft enquiry created by the student.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - the ID of the draft enquiry to delete
      studentID - the ID of the student deleting the draft enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false otherwise
